verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David רִיבָ֣ה <WH7378> Plead יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> [my cause] O LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְרִיבַ֑י <WH3401> with them that strive לְ֝חַ֗ם <WH3898> with me fight אֶת־ <WH853> לֹֽחֲמָֽי׃ <WH3898> against them that fight
הַחֲזֵ֣ק <WH2388> Take hold מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> of shield וְצִנָּ֑ה <WH6793> and buckler וְ֝ק֗וּמָה <WH6965> and stand up בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃ <WH5833> for mine help

וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק <WH7324> Draw out חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> also the spear וּ֭סְגֹר <WH5462> and stop לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> [the way] against רֹדְפָ֑י <WH7291> them that persecute אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> me say לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> unto my soul יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ <WH3444> I [am] thy salvation אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be confounded וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ <WH3637> and put to shame מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <WH1245> that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <WH5472> let them be turned אָח֣וֹר <WH268> back וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ <WH2659> and brought to confusion חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י <WH2803> that devise רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> my hurt

יִֽהְי֗וּ <WH1961> them be like כְּמֹ֥ץ <WH4671> Let them be as chaff לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> the wind וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ <WH4397> and let the angel יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD דּוֹחֶֽה׃ <WH1760> chase

יְֽהִי־ <WH1961> Let דַרְכָּ֗ם <WH1870> Let their way חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> be dark וַחֲלַקְלַקּ֑וֹת <WH2519> and slippery וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> and let the angel יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD רֹדְפָֽם׃ <WH7291> persecute

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חִנָּ֣ם <WH2600> For without cause טָֽמְנוּ־ <WH2934> have they hid לִ֭י שַׁ֣חַת <WH7845> [in] a pit רִשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH7568> for me their net חִ֝נָּ֗ם <WH2600> [which] without cause חָפְר֥וּ <WH2658> they have digged לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> for my soul

תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ <WH935> come שׁוֹאָה֮ <WH7722> Let destruction לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֵ֫דָ֥ע <WH3045> acknowledge וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH7568> and let his net אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which טָמַ֣ן <WH2934> that he hath hid תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ <WH3920> catch בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה <WH7722> himself into that very destruction יִפָּל־ <WH5307> let him fall בָּֽהּ׃
וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <WH5315> And my soul תָּגִ֣יל <WH1523> shall be joyful בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD תָּ֝שִׂישׂ <WH7797> it shall rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> in his salvation

כָּ֥ל <WH3605> All עַצְמוֹתַ֨י ׀ <WH6106> All my bones תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ <WH559> shall say יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> LORD מִ֥י <WH4310> who כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ <WH3644> is like מַצִּ֣יל <WH5337> who [is] like unto thee which deliverest עָ֭נִי <WH6041> the poor מֵחָזָ֣ק <WH2389> from him that is too strong מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> is too וְעָנִ֥י <WH6041> for him yea the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <WH34> and the needy מִגֹּזְלֽוֹ׃ <WH1497> from him that spoileth

יְ֭קוּמוּן <WH6965> did rise up עֵדֵ֣י <WH5707> witnesses חָמָ֑ס <WH2555> FALSE אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> [things] that I knew יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃ <WH7592> they laid to my charge
יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי <WH7999> They rewarded רָ֭עָה <WH7451> me evil תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash טוֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> for good שְׁכ֣וֹל <WH7908> [to] the spoiling לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> of my soul

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> Me בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם <WH2470> But as for me when they were sick לְב֬וּשִׁי <WH3830> my clothing שָׂ֗ק <WH8242> [was] sackcloth עִנֵּ֣יתִי <WH6031> I humbled בַצּ֣וֹם <WH6685> with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <WH8605> and my prayer עַל־ <WH5921> unto חֵיקִ֥י <WH2436> into mine own bosom תָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> returned

כְּרֵֽעַ־ <WH7453> myself as though [he had been] my friend כְּאָ֣ח <WH251> [or] brother לִ֭י הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> I behaved כַּאֲבֶל־ <WH57> as one that mourneth אֵ֝֗ם <WH517> [for his] mother קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> heavily שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃ <WH7817> I bowed down

וּבְצַלְעִי֮ <WH6761> But in mine adversity שָׂמְח֪וּ <WH8055> they rejoiced וְֽנֶאֱ֫סָ֥פוּ <WH622> and gathered themselves together נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ <WH622> gathered themselves together עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against נֵ֭כִים <WH5222> [yea] the abjects וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without יָדַ֑עְתִּי <WH3045> against me and I knew קָֽרְע֥וּ <WH7167> [it] not they did tear וְלֹא־ <WH3808> without דָֽמּוּ׃ <WH1826> [me] and ceased
בְּ֭חַנְפֵי <WH2611> With hypocritical לַעֲגֵ֣י <WH3934> mockers מָע֑וֹג <WH4580> in feasts חָרֹ֖ק <WH2786> they gnashed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> with שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃ <WH8127> upon me with their teeth

אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> Lord כַּמָּ֪ה <WH4100> how תִּ֫רְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> how long wilt thou look on הָשִׁ֣יבָה <WH7725> ? rescue נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> my soul מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7722> from their destructions מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים <WH3715> from the lions יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <WH3173> my darling

א֭וֹדְךָ <WH3034> I will give thee thanks בְּקָהָ֣ל <WH6951> congregation רָ֑ב <WH7227> in the great בְּעַ֖ם <WH5971> people עָצ֣וּם <WH6099> thee among much אֲהַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <WH1984> I will praise אַֽל־ <WH408> nay יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> cheer up

לִ֣י אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> Let not them that are mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> wrongfully שֹׂנְאַ֥י <WH8130> that hate חִ֝נָּ֗ם <WH2600> me without a cause יִקְרְצוּ־ <WH7169> over me [neither] let them wink עָֽיִן׃ <WH5869> with the eye

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> not peace יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ <WH1696> For they speak וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> against רִגְעֵי־ <WH7282> against [them that are] quiet אֶ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> matters מִ֝רְמוֹת <WH4820> deceitful יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃ <WH2803> but they devise

וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <WH7337> wide עָלַ֗י <WH5921> against פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH6310> Yea they opened their mouth אָ֭מְרוּ <WH559> against me [and] said הֶאָ֣ח ׀ <WH1889> Aha הֶאָ֑ח <WH1889> aha רָאֲתָ֥ה <WH7200> hath seen עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> our eye

רָאִ֣יתָה <WH7200> [This] thou hast seen יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD אַֽל־ <WH408> not תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ <WH2790> keep not silence אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> O Lord אֲל־ <WH408> not תִּרְחַ֥ק <WH7368> be not far מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

הָעִ֣ירָה <WH5782> Stir up וְ֭הָקִיצָה <WH6974> thyself and awake לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <WH4941> to my judgment אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> my God וַֽאדֹנָ֣י <WH136> and my Lord לְרִיבִֽי׃ <WH7379> [even] unto my cause

שָׁפְטֵ֣נִי <WH8199> Judge כְ֭צִדְקְךָ <WH6664> according to thy righteousness יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֗י <WH430> my God וְאַל־ <WH408> not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> and let them not rejoice לִֽי׃

אַל־ <WH408> not יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> Let them not say בְ֭לִבָּם <WH3820> in their hearts הֶאָ֣ח <WH1889> Ah נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <WH5315> so would we have it אַל־ <WH408> not יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ <WH559> let them not say בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃ <WH1104> We have swallowed him up

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ ׀ <WH2659> and brought to confusion יַחְדָּו֮ <WH3162> together שְׂמֵחֵ֪י <WH8056> that rejoice רָעָ֫תִ֥י <WH7451> at mine hurt יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH3847> let them be clothed בֹ֥שֶׁת <WH1322> with shame וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <WH3639> and dishonour הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים <WH1431> that magnify עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> over

יָרֹ֣נּוּ <WH7442> Let them shout for joy וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ <WH8055> and be glad חֲפֵצֵ֪י <WH2655> that favour צִ֫דְקִ֥י <WH6664> my righteous cause וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yea let them say תָ֭מִיד <WH8548> continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Let the LORD הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ <WH2655> which hath pleasure שְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> in the prosperity עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5650> of his servant

וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <WH3956> And my tongue תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> shall speak צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <WH6664> of thy righteousness כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּוֹם <WH3117> all the day תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> [and] of thy praise
